turkish_example_sentence: Biz deniz kenarındaki küçük beyaz yata sahip olmuş olsaydık, tatilde uzak adalara giderdik
english_example_sentence: If we had had the small white yacht by the sea, we would have gone to distant islands on vacation
russian_example_sentence: Если бы мы имели маленькую белую яхту у моря, мы бы поехали на далекие острова в отпуск
